name: Police Chase Street Adventure
description:
Hit other speedy cars in this amazing rush racing experience. Begin the battle of better driving simulation and win over everything. Racing action and adventure in the advance city roads straight journey. Jus tap and run through the street like a rogue racer. Drive the racing car on the streets full of traffic like you are competing in a race in a stadium full of people.
Police Chase Street Adventure features:
• Complete stunt driving on a road full of traffic.
• Intense traffic hour at the road, speedy vehicles passing by and increasing the chances of the accidents.
• Rip apart the road after jumping over the stunt ramps on the way.
• Take the police chase challenge seriously and don’t let the police cops chase you successfully and arrest the racers.
• Cross finish line before the police cops get their hands on the racer.
• Tilt the screen right and left to ensure the driving at the extreme speed possible.
• Collect the boosters on the way and win the challenge with huge shift in the acceleration
• Meet up the rivals on the road and make a perfect racing journey
• Never ending racing challenges made with the extremely well graphics and extra special simulation
• Don’t stop speeding and slow down, cops chasing the speed racer so they can arrest you.
